title: Aide

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- House of the Damned (Night, 1 use): You will heal all members of the Unseen other than yourself for this night and the next.
- Household Duties (Night): Choose an Unseen member. If they do not perform a night ability, you will give them Invincible defense for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you die the night that you use House of the Damned, the Unseen will still be healed the following night.
- You are roleblock immune on the second night you heal the Unseen.

desc:
Post 1085
*The truth hurts and the lies heal.*
